[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I – Exile all other nonland permanents.
II – Lay waste.

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if that player controls more than one face-up land, that player lays waste. [i](To lay waste, exile a face-up land you control and return it to the battlefield face down and tapped. It's a land with “{T}: Add {C}.”)[/i]
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Draw a card.
